title: Realizing an Anolyte Utilization Rate of 99% in Low-cost Zinc-based Flow Batteries by Rejuvenating Dead Zinc
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01015A, Paper
Shengnan Wang, Tianyu Li, Chenguang Yuan, Jiaxiong Zhu, Pei Li, Shaoce Zhang, Zhiquan Wei, Yiqiao Wang, Xianfeng Li, Chunyi Zhi
Zinc-based flow batteries (ZFBs) are regarded as promising candidates for large-scale energy storage systems. However, the formation of dead zinc and dendrites, especially at high areal capacities and current densities,...
